description: This file defines a Dart class named ChatMessage that models a chat message with fields for id, userId, message, and timestamp. It utilizes json_serializable for JSON serialization.

classes.name: ChatMessage
classes.description: A Dart class representing a chat message with JSON serialization capabilities.

methods.name: ChatMessage.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a ChatMessage instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts the ChatMessage instance to a JSON map.
